duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately input financial data into accounting software and spreadsheets.
Assist in reviewing and processing invoices from vendors, ensuring adherence to university policies and procedures.
Monitor and categorize expenses to appropriate accounts.
Prepare routine financial reports, summaries, and statements for review by senior accounting staff.
Collaborate with the accounting team to compile data for budgeting purposes.
Communicate effectively with university staff, vendors, and internal stakeholders to ensure accurate and timely processing of financial transactions.
Provide general administrative support to the accounting department, including filing documents, organizing financial records, and maintaining the overall efficiency of the office.
Ensure compliance with university financial policies, regulations, and guidelines.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; some college coursework in accounting or finance preferred.
